Name: project_status_must_be_active
Description: Ensure project is active and ongoing

Name: team_location_consistency
Description: Maintain team location consistency across projects

Name: user_story_prioritization_must_be_high
Description: Prioritize user stories with high priority

Name: employee_availability_must_be_fulltime
Description: Ensure full-time availability of team members

Name: feature_priority_must_be_high
Description: Features must have a high priority level

Name: sprint_review_feedback_must_be_positive
Description: Positive feedback from sprint reviews is required

Name: stakeholder_relevance_must_be_high
Description: Stakeholders must have high relevance to features

Name: release_plan_status_must_be_active
Description: Ensure release plans are active and progressing
